snippet.title: Santa Fe Mysteries - Sacred Ground (1997) PC 1st-person FMV Mystery Adventure
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   *OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS*   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Santa Fe Mysteries - Sacred Ground (1997) PC 1st-person FMV Mystery Adventure

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Info:◄*

https://www.mobygames.com/game/28352/santa-fe-mysteries-sacred-ground/

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=26879

https://www.igdb.com/games/santa-fe-mysteries-sacred-ground

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Engine:◄*

???

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Other First Person Games from the developers "Activision":◄*

Return to Zork (1993)
https://youtu.be/NSoT0Ty8MVQ 🇺🇸
https://youtu.be/VO8G-fi1E0I 🇩🇪

Zork Nemesis - The Forbidden Lands (1996)
https://youtu.be/KqR6zisjCDc 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/67Lr3sGUMPU 🇩🇪 

Santa Fe Mysteries - The Elk Moon Murder (1996)
https://youtu.be/6W95Ypb0Iew 🇺🇸 

Santa Fe Mysteries - Sacred Ground (1997)
https://youtu.be/6XDiIWw-av4 🇺🇸 

Zork - Grand Inquisitor (1997)
https://youtu.be/nS7wjwt-2uQ 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/StUNMwkY3lM 🇩🇪 

Battlezone (1998)
https://youtu.be/Y2c5FWyagJA 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/K8midL6Qs54 🇩🇪 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►The Hall:◄* --- German/Deutsch

https://www.youtube.com/@HoFPG/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=4

*►The Hall:◄* --- English

https://www.youtube.com/@HoFPG/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Long version:◄*
https://youtu.be/MxtYBgnrTd4

*►Short version:◄*
https://youtu.be/6XDiIWw-av4

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Gameplay:◄*

00:00 - Intro
00:03 - Intro & Main
03:30 - Gameplay - Check the info box for further details

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►You can get the game here:◄*

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/UNTZ3o

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/Ukwymj

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Hall Support:◄*

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

Do you have a Ko-fi for me?
https://ko-fi.com/hofpg

GOG (Affiliate link):
https://adtr.co/x2c72N

https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e
